There are typically two cases to exclude or block the device from wireless network on router admin interface. \n\nCase 1: \nClick the Deny/Disable icon to remove a device. \nStep 1 - Enter the login details.
Step 2 - Find the wireless client list. Change the device to Deny mode.
Case 2: Configure the MAC address filter to remove a device
Step 1 - Enter the login details
Step 2 - Locate the device you want to forbid. Copy its MAC address
